#include <stdio.h>

int main(void) {
	int t,i,a,b,c,sum=0;
	scanf("%d",&t);
	for(i=0;i<t;i++)
	{
		scanf("%d %d %d",&a,&b,&c);
		int n1=a%2;
		int n2=b%2;
		int n3=c%2;
		sum=a+b+c;
		if(a+b<c||b+c<a||a+c<b)
		{
			printf("Alice\n");
		}
		else if(sum%2==0)
		{
			printf("Bob\n");
		}
		else
		{
			printf("Alice\n");
		}
	}
	return 0;
}
